what_you_do: Corey Poirier is a multiple-time TEDx speaker, keynote speaker, and best-selling author who empowers lives through his purposeful visions, commitment, and passion.
who_you_serve: Corey Poirier speaks at events and shares his messages with a universal audience, inspiring individuals to pursue their passions and dreams.
social_proof: Corey Poirier has been named on the 15 SUCCESS Magazine Emerging Entrepreneurs list, and he has spoken at events at Oxford, UCLA, MIT, Harvard, Cambridge, Microsoft, Stanford, and Columbia.
signature_programs: Corey Poirier is the founder of The Speaking Program and bLU Talks, which are platforms dedicated to educating, inspiring, and motivating people to reach their full potential. He is also the host of the radio shows Conversations with PASSION and For The Love Of Speaking Show.
business_focus: Corey Poirier is a transformative leader who empowers people to pursue their passions and dreams through his speaking, writing, and entrepreneurial ventures.
service_provided: public speaking, keynote speaking, authorship, radio shows, entrepreneurship
